text: @realDonaldTrump Fear of illness and people dying due to your love of money and inadequate, “hoaxie” response to COVID-19 disease shut down the country. Airlines, cruise ships, and large crowd events are not going to fill up again just because you say so (excepting killing field MAGA rallies).

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
